Class GuideController

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers.guides.GuideController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGuideController, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer

    GuideCategoryAxisController, GuideRadarChartController, GuideValueAxisController

    public abstract class GuideController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer, java.io.Serializable, IGuideController
    This class is a controller for Guide.
